title: Op Adc kennen build?
body:
{{item:3124}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3053}} 

Rage blade procs kennen passive every 3 hits.
full build damage= 267
kennen w passive = 80% of ad= 213.6 
crit= 50% (hurricane + ie) roughly 765 per crit at full build. Including W passive = 978
every kennen w passive auto would do around 480. not including crits.
 

Did it last ranked game and it wasn't bad but this build would be defiantly better with less tanks on the opposing team. {{champion:85}}  


What do you think?
